price: When We intend something, We only say to it, “Be!”, and it is.
arabic: إِنَّمَا قَوۡلُنَا لِشَيۡءٍ إِذَآ أَرَدۡنَٰهُ أَن نَّقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
